values: Things are finally starting to fall into place it seems. I'm back to just the one job and I'm already way happier. I seem to have a plan for my future that doesn't involve me leaving which is always good. I just wish I could start my school so I can really begin the rest of my life. It's really weird because it seems more and more everyday that I'm getting older. Not in a bad way but just moving on with life and letting things fall where they're gonna fall. I can't remember ever being this relaxed and happy with the way things are so I can't even imagine how things are gonna be once I get out of school and my plans really start to unfold. I can't wait to be out on my own without my mom breathing down my neck everyday either. Just a few more months and that will be all over :)

things have been super amazingly crazy the past few weeks. it almost seems like i've lost my mind lol. i've been workin a shit load like 65hours a week and crap but i've been making so many new friends and going out and enjoying my youth lol. my best friends are about to have a baby, my sister is gonna have a baby, i have a new girl, things just keep coming on and on and on but it hasn't gotten to me at all. my outlook has changed and i've been so crazy happy about it i could explode. i've gotten to the point where almost nothin can just ruin my day because after all i make the choice weather or not to be happy, sad or otherwise. i'm finally just lettin life take it's path and going with the flow and it is so relaxing to not get all stressed over nothin. i pretty wake up in an awesome frame of mind everyday and i feel like such a nerd but i don't really care. it doesn't hurt that i wake up next to an amazing girl every once in awhile :) i just hope and things continue on the path they are for awhile cuz i kinda like how life is at the moment

Things have seemed a little strange the last few days. Old feelings coming around. New interests from out of the blue have been confusing my mind. I really just want to get away from a day or two just to kinda clear my head out. Can't seem to choose weather to go alone or not. I want to see the ocean and the rocks. It's been so long since I've seen or smelt or heard real ocean. It would be nice to have company but at the same time I'm not sure I want it. Maybe this one will be just me and chance. It's hard fighting back the urge to chase a flame. I'm not sure I'm ment for this right now. Being a good man sometimes just isn't any good at all. Well in terms of what I think I want. I want more friends to go out with, and for things like an ocean trip. I really don't want to work anymore. Life seems to trap me and hold me down. I know it's because I let my fears take control of my actions. My fears are more like a reaction to life's path. I want so badly to change and feel like sometimes I'm stepping forward and out but just not in strides. Baby steps are all I can seem to muster no matter how hard I try. I need to find a free spirit to try and help push me the rest of the way out the door and into the world. The world is bigger than tacoma and I think that's what scares me.

well things didn't really go the way i thought they would. it was just one of those days i guesss. getting ready to work another double tommorrow. i'm trying hard not to think about it. i can't wait till i get the chance to go out again. it just sux haveing to work doubles sometimes cuz i can't enjoy the night life sometimes. i'm really glad i have the friends i do, even if when they try and set me up it doesn't exactly work out lol. tommorrow should make for an interesting evening. the plan is to hang out with an old "friend" so we'll see how that transpires. this weekend is hopefully gonna be full of some fun and new adventures. work saturday morning but i'll make the best of it. never know maybe i'll meet someone else new and things will go a new way. only time and life will tell.

Here i am working two jobs like i never thought i would. one for lexus and one at petsmart as an early morning stocker. it's tough but it's life. gotta do what ya gotta do to get by. things otherwise are going ok. a little strange here and there but ok. it must be true that opposited attrack, or at least there is some truth to the statment. i've seen some people from back in the day and met some new ones and things are changing and life is going on pretty well much to my suprise. i've decided i'm done with the relationship aspect of my life for a little while. they make things complicated and i would like things to stay simple for awhile. i want to date i just don't want to be comitted at the moment. i've been out a few times and talked to a few girls and i'll just have to see how things progress as i get back into the swing of the "game". i can't wait to take the next turn in my life cuz i have no clue witch way i'm going or where i'm heading next. for once i'm kind of excited to find out the unknown. life is outside, not in a box, or at a cae wash, or a pet store, or in the same old town.

holy crap i can't believe i still have a livejournal! i lost my password it's been so long. so much has happend there is no way to put it all in. so i won't i'll go with the recent. my birthday has came and past and it was fairly lame i was in bed by 1130. but can't really blame anyone but me in that case. things have been a little crazy lately. i work two jobs now and plan to join the navy. i'm stay with my mom again and that's no fun. i'm single again(boooo). i'm dying to hang out and go out all the time but rarely do simply because i have no people to really go with. the people i most like to hang out with are married or dating and can't go out with me without their boyfriend or they are to messed up and broke all the time they can't and don't want to go out. i guess i should start living a little more rather than staying in a shell being scared of losing money. if i weren't so damn cheap i might have a good time. but that's only gonna change with time i guess. it's time for me to really look at my life and get my shit straight. i need to take away my fears and get new ones, if that makes sense. 
current list:
being broke and not being able to pay bills
turning into the sad little boy i was in high school
not being able to make friends
not being able to keep old friends
becoming a super fatty lol
not being able to join the navy
not being able to lose the weight
CHANGE!!!

new list:
...


i guess i just need to see where life takes me. but the real thing is i need to let life take me where i'm ment to go. stop trying trying to force things to be what i'm used to and what is safe to me. embrace change don't fear it. i'm scared to death right now about what's gonna happen but i need to take off the training wheels and start new. i need to be ready for life. now lets see where this goes...

work is extremely lame. i really think i have a depression problem which is very sad to me. then again i could just be a head case that loves attention. "look at me! look at me!" my only true problems are my own inabilities. perhaps someday i'll fix it but i always say i will and never do so i'll say it again maybe some day.

no one knows what i've done
i know all the words to the perfect tragedy
trust in the words i say to you.
it's killing you to see me desperate
it seemed to stop my breath.
every second i'm without you i'm a mess
in your eyes you see my smile
i'm a fake!
you can tell by my vague perception
you read my slightest false tellings
but can you see past the blinder set here?
perhaps i've lost my head
if i cut out the bad
what would i have left?
my continuous speech seems to be as simple as E=Mc2
but the answer to happiness is quite simple in fact
your all that is left in the equation
life-bad=you
to cut out all the bad would lead to simple perfection
i will always have something left as long as i have you.
i'll remember every glance you pass my way.
every night with your head on my chest,
all the cliche lines could never replace the one simple fact
i love you. 

19years alive - 15years wasted = 4 years i've lived knowing you
being alive and living are polar opposites
to be alive is simply to breath,
to live is...

the forever unknown "in love"

this seem strange but right. i feel i'm in a very weird state of mind. i want so bad to write and write well. but whenever i try and create something or do come up with something it is sad or depressing. even if that's not the way i feel. like now, i'm perfectly happy other than i can't sleep and i feel like puking everywhere. but if i were to write something it would entail heartache and love loss. i don't really know what that means. maybe that's just how i am. who knows what the mind is really like anyway.

there is no correlation
between mind and soul.
simplicity is a mindset 
lost in space.
perfection is a self imposed pain.
the heart is a perfectionist.
there is more to living
than being alive.
independence is a shield to the world.
love is independent to us.
bravery provides exclusion from fear.
the brave die alone.
the lie is
the good die young.
strength requires heart.
the heartless survive.

i live complete,
mind and soul.
i claim a mindset,
simple.
i possess one prayer,
perfection.
i can survive in the world,
indpendent.
i brave life,
alone.
i strive to be strong,
heartless.


when most get done reading this they'll be silent. it will be misunderstood a million times over. but silence screams to me. it apears jumbled and senseless, but isn't that all life is? one jumbled, senseless pursuit of the unknown? i know i'm really crazy, depressing and sad a lot of the time but i'm tired of the unknown. i'm done looking. i want to be done trying. my pursuit ends here. i don't really know what that means. i don't really care either. if i could explain it. it wouldn't make sense anymore.

-adamo

i'm a weird kid. 



Good things about me
-generally a good friend
-funny
-work hard
-care 
-try to help everywhere i can
-i have dreams
-i take care of myself
-i have a job
-i have great people around me

Things that are not so good about me
-rude
-lazy at home
-don't know what to do with my life
-scared of the future
-stuck on someone i know i can never have again
-still live in high school
-can't figure out what i need 
-have no direction
-i'm a liar
-i don't live life to the fullest as much as i say i do
-have no idea how to make any decisions that affect my life
-don't know what to look for or what i want in a significant other
-i'm judgmental
-i treat a lot of people differently


i want to believe that in general i'm a good person. most days i can convince myself i am. but others i'm not so sure. it's hard to wake up with a weary heart and wilting faith

i think i should move. just to start a new. i think it would do me some good to be away from things. now if only that dream could come true. someday when my head is strait and i have a career instead of a job. maybe...just maybe

-adamo

i think something is wrong with me head...sad
-adamo

thankful for

the first of many missed thanksgivings 

this was a bad start to the holiday season

-adamo

i can't explain how i feel right now. things aren't right but i don't really know for sure what it is. things is the relationship area really haven't changed much in awhile and i guess that's getting to me a little more than it should. work is work. i do it way to much and i'm still really freakin broke. my sister is continually gettin to me. my life is constantly on hold for her punk ass cuz i have to drive her around all the time. me and my mom always have to cater to her schedule and work our lives and plans around her work and shit. i'm really happy i bought my truck though. i was out and around the other day and i was just kinda proud that i had something like that to call my own. i've been thinking about getting a second job just so i don't have to be at home so much. i always talk about moving out but i really doubt i will anytime soon. as for my friends i'm really kinda confused right now. i love all of them of course but i don't really know about some stuff right now. i freaky how just blah my life is all the time. i'm not happy with things the way they are right now but sadly only i can really change that and i just don't know what to do to fix things. i want to go to school and i really want to have someone special around but i've always had that freakin problem. it's just this time of year cuz i like to sit by the fire and cuddle up with someone and just talk and drink hot coco or cider. but i guess i'm just kind of a sucker like that. i hope i can figure things out pretty soon but i know i need help. but i've always had a problem asking for help and excepting help that people want to give me. life...

adamo

life=boo :(

thinking way to much
want to go back to when i was normal and happy. before all the booze and pills and cuts and heartbreaks and lies and all that other stupid crap. back to when i was adam
- ?

it's kinda been awhile. things are just kinda blah. i just work all the time and stuff. i still really need to move out of this house. i got a tattoo and i really miss a lot of people. i wish a lot of things could be different but i know they can't be.
-adamo

anyone have a couch i can stay on?
-adamo

wow my life is predictable. things were beginning to pile up like they always do and tonight things were capped off with tabi breaking up with me. i've seen it coming the last few days but gave her the benefit of the doubt like i always do in relationships. my mom is still in the hospital and i still can't drive my damn truck. it's time for me to get a new life somewhere else. no more of this crap
-adamo

things are just weird right now. i got my truck and i love it but i pissed off my best friend today. and my mom is in the hospital again. she's ok but i'm just really tired of this happening to her, every year for the last 6 years she's been in there for some reason or another. i havn't seen tabi in a awhile and that sux. something is wrong and she doesn't want to talk about it. i can't force her to but i would like to help some how. i hate being helpless, it's easily my worst fear. and now i can't help my mom or my girlfriend, neither one can control that but i just hate being helpless cuz that makes me feel useless to everyone. but hopfully things will get better. i think they will
-adamo

i love being happy. and i love having someone who makes me happy. i'm so content it's scary
-adamo

things are...well i can't really explain. things have changed a bit recently. alaska is drivin me crazy in a lot of ways. but i don't know it's a weird feeling. this is a bad word to compare it to but it's like love you just can't ever explain it. speaking of which i have found someone very special to me. well i know her from a long time ago but she has really grown on me. and now i can officially say she is all mine and i can't wait to be home so i can be with her. i always say how much i miss everyone but that is old now and everyone knows it and are tired of hearing it and i don't blame them at all for that. i kinda like being away though. i'll have to do it more often. but next time it will be somewhere fun and interesting not a place where i work all the time and then work myself to death by working out and other stuff. anyway everyone stay happy and smile and all that stuff :)

things are kinda weird right now. alaska seems a lot different this time around. i don't know how to explain it. but it's not fun, i'm working more now. i'm up to 91hrs a week. i'm not eating all that much, and i don't feel good at all. but anyway maybe things will get better. i hope anyway. i just need to come home and soon. i miss tabi, she makes me smile :) i miss brandy and katie too cuz i always have fun with them. i want to be home so i can be heathly and have fun no more of this sick not eating crap. but i'm losing weight :)
-adamo

so this is kinda weird...it's dark out...lol i've been in alaska for the last 3 weeks working. i'm finally home for my only week off this summer and it's been awesome so far. my first day i saw my boys which was good cuz we have good times always. that same day i saw some of my best buddies like the brandy and katie. lizz and joel are pretty cool people as well. the next day was with the boys again doin a little partyin. couple drinks and some laughs is always good times. then today i went to a rainiers game with kelly and brenda. sometimes we all fight and bicker but those two are pretty cool. i also saw megan today which was very nice cuz it's been awhile :) tomorrow who knows what i'm doin. but i can't wait for saturday cuz i finally get to see tabi. i've been waiting seems like forever. hopefully i'll see a lot more people before i leave sunday cuz who knows i may never make it back again. i know that is horrible to say but shit happens so i just want everyone to know that i love them and all that good stuff
-adamo

so here i am...in alaska...what the fuck am i doing here? i don't really know, i guess cuz i need the money for school and everything. but i can not stop thinking about everyone back home. Tabi, Hayley, Katie, Brandy, the boys, Whitney, Brenda, Kelly freaking everyone. i don't really have anything to distract me either. the work is just simple tasks and i get them done and then just kinda sit. so that leaves me plenty of time to just sit and think about everyone. i miss everything about home. this is another year that i don't really have a birthday cuz i'm not around any of my friends or family. i would do anything to just come home. i still have something around 6 or 7 weeks till i can come back. my mom refuses to let me come home early and that just fuckin hurts but whatever, guess i just need to toughin up and deal with the life i choose. sorry to bitch and moan. I MISS YOU ALL!!!!
-adamo

So yeah I'm leaving tonight and I'll be gone for like 8 weeks!!!! This shit is just wrong! I saw people last night which was good. And I finally saw Tabi which freakin made my day. I havn't seen her in about 5 years and it was just really awesome to finally get a chance to see her. It really sucks she lives way out in bumfuck Port Orchard. But I'll be seeing her more which makes me happy. Anyway I'm really gonna miss everyone and I hope everyone has a really awesome summer. Hopefully I'll have some sort of contact with people while I'm up there but who knows. I hope people don't miss me too much...SIKE! Everyone better miss me a lot cuz I'm Adamo bitch there ain't no one like this...lol
-adamo

i don't really know how i feel right now. my dad was here this weekend and i don't know. i'm happy as hell grad is over though. i feel like i kinda screwed up some stuff, hmmm shit...i'm out
-adamo

and i said life sucked hahahaha...this shit is the best

-adamo

this weekend was pretty freaking sweet i'm not gonna lie. my sister had her baby and it was so awesome! she had a little girl and her name is isabelle mary. i held her for the first time and i never wanted to put her down after that. then i basically hung out with jeremy all weekend. i love that kid man that is my brother i would die with out him. then i got to spend some time with katie which was really great :)then i chilled with jordan on his birthday which was pretty fun just chillin with him and jeremy. then i FINALLY got to see whitney which was so awesome. i missed that girl so much she was gone for like a year and now she's back! me her and jeremy hung out for a bit and i hope i can't hang out with her a little later on this week so we can catch up a little more. anyway that's about my weekend so yeah it was good and i'm pretty damn happy right now
-adamo

life wasn't so unbearable today. i could stand schoo and some of the people in it. i've realized i've got a real good friend in someone i never realized cared so much. recently brandy saved me and i can't even explain how awesome that girl is. i'm so glad i'm going to prom with her. ana as well cuz she is one of the funest people i've ever been around. me and jeremy have been hanging out a lot lately and that's been really nice just to be able to chill with him cuz i need that kinda thing these days. i feel like i'm getting a little more back to normal. there are some people that i really need to see and they know who they are. i just wish they wanted to see me as much as i want to see them. this weekend is gonna be good, it's 4 days just to get away. maybe my world can come back to normal in these next few days and i can fixed the things that i've destroyed over the last few weeks. i hope my friends are really forgiving and are willing to give me a chance to be the friend i can really be to them
-adamo

i'm sick...just not in a physical sense. 

Just in case I don't make it back 

Have a beer for me, don't waste no tears on me 
On Friday night sit on the visitors side 
And cheer for the home team 
Drive my Camaro, 90 miles an hour down Red Rock Road 
With 'Born to Run' blastin' on the radio 
And find some girl good enough to love 
And love her like I would have 

Don't miss me






i'm done now

-adamo

i have so much crap on my mind that it hurts. the only problem is i can't clear it all up to know what's going on in my life right now. but whatever this is all just blah blah bull anyway.
-adamo

So yeah things are kinda dumb lately. But I guess that's just the name of the game. Grad is coming up so things will hopefully cheer up a little more. Prom is coming to. Me and Megan are going and that's cool. Just gotta try and not make it a big deal I guess. But whatever should be ok...better times are coming so it will be all good. I've been hanging out with people lately. I have the best friends anyone could ever ask for. Even though I know I'm not the best or easiest person to be friends with. But my friends stick with me anyway. I may not have many but I wouldn't trade any of the for the world. My friends always make me smile, even when it seems impossible to do so they always find a way to cheer me up and show me that things will be ok. I'm gonna try and be a better friend. That's my new goal...to give my friends a friend they deserve not one that forgets about them till I need them but I'll always be around not just when I need help. Anyway I'm rambling again...lol
-adamo
Here we go again...alone. this shit sucks. i hate the hurt

i'm happy...that's about all there is to say. school is awesome since i finally have my schedule the way i want it, baseball is right around the corner, break is in like a week...and i have the most amazing girl anyone could ever ask for. i love spending time with her, no matter what we do it's always different. i like walks on the beach even if it is really windy out. i can't wait for it to be warm out all the time
-adamo

i really do not like this week. finals and all that crap, it's just annoying. i had my first final today and i don't really know if it went to well. but my day got better when i hung out with megan after school, even if it was for only like not that long. long enough for me to beat her at scene it again...lol i'm the freakin champ at that game. i can't wait for baseball to start. i'm goin to fanfest this weekend. i'm kinda dreading the rest of the week cuz i work the next two days and have finals and just it's all dumb. 

-adamo

things won't ever be as good as they are right now. this whole weekend was just awesome. i took megan out to dinner at the ram friday night. the food was really really good. then we watched bad news bears, eh it was alright but the company was much better. the next day i went to work which wasn't to bad. spent most of my time just thinking about the night before and what i wanted to do that night. then i finally got to go to practice and i was hitting pretty nice which was a pleasant change. went and visited megan before she had to go to work then went home. went back to megan's after she got off work and we went to safeway and got apples and chips and then went back to her house to watch old school with her and her little sister. then today, of course we watched the seahawks walk all over the panthers...steve smith who? now i'm just chillin here waiting for monday and school which is gonna not be cool but whatever it's the last week of first semester. i can't wait for another weekend like this one. i just don't want it to end.

-adamo

school is going by way to slow! all i need to do is get through this semester and then it's basically over. a small preview of my schedule;bowl/golf-ta-ta-sports med...english-civics or whatever the hell class that is-orchestra-early d. so really all i have to do is english and the other one, and i'm not having hankel i'm going to talk about that one with mrs marsh like tuesday. but i have robinson for english so that should be nice, i might change bowl/ golf cuz i can't really afford to pay for it so we'll see what that becomes here soon. but not long now and i'll have the easy schedule and baseball and even more megan so live should be pretty good to me lets hope :)
-adamo

So yeah things have been...how can I say this...FREAKING AMAZING!!! Lately things just couldn't be better. I have no problem except for the stupid blood bank people messed up today and I'm not even supposed to donate till the 24th. But other than that I'm all smiles. Megan is the most unbelievable person I've met. We always have fun together, even when we aren't doing anything, we can talk and that's the best part. She's the first girl I've been with who likes to be around me as much as I like to be around her. She is for sure a special one, and I'm not letting this one get away. I've screwed up many times before but she makes me feel different, like I can't screw up. This has never happened before...and I like it. I LOVE HER! She's the only girl I've ever put over baseball, and anyone who knows me knows that that is serious.

-adamo

So for the first day in 06 I really can't see it being any better. I got home and watched some football, then the beautiful Megan came over for the rest of the Hawks game. We just hung out together all day and I totally beat her ass at football. Watching the Iron Chef American, and that damn Santino(trust me the guy is an ass...lol) it's refreshing to finally start a new year off good. Anyway I hope everyone else has had a good start.

-Adamo

hmmm...i don't got a whole lot to write about. nothing has really been happening, most nights i've been by myself cuz my mom works all the time. but it's all good i enjoy alone time. but i have enjoyed the company of a few people mainly megan and fj bentley. news years is coming up, should be fun. gonna chill with the guys and maybe some other people who knows. i'm rambling but i don't really care...lol. anyway hope everyone has had good break so far. call if you feel like hanging out i don't really care how long it's been you are all still my friends and i would love to see you. so...yeah bye

-adamo

It's Christmas! finally even though my spirit was a little low this year, it's all good cuz it was an awesome christmas. i got lots of movies and all sorts of good stuff which is nice. anyway hope everyone else has had a good christmas 

<3 adamo


I love Megan!!!!! :)

Today started out, and I thought it might be a bad day. But it turned out to be one of the best days. I can't really explain how great it was. I love UFC, Home Alone, and warming up (since it is really cold out). Hopefully tomorrow and the next day and everyday after that will be as good as today was.

Stay with me, 
You make everything alright.
Don't leave me now,
A few more minutes won't hurt.

Everytime I'm with you this comes to mind.
One day you won't have to leave.
The minutes can turn to hours and hours to days.
Stay with me and you'll see...


-adamo

i hope i didn't speak to soon. we shall see

-adamo

so lately things have been pretty awesome i must say. today i got a job yesterday me and megan watched the hawks destroy the eagles. but that wasn't even the best part of the night. i can't really choose a best part, the whole thing was so fun. she can always make me feel better. hopefully this weekend will have more fun days just like last weekend and zoolights :)

-adamo

I'm sitting here at home not even knowing what to do ot think. Last night one of my friends was killed...what do you say to something like that. I've know him a long ass time and then he's just gone. I was supposed to sit next to him in English this morning. I figured he was just sick or something. Come to find out the next period he was killed by a train the night before. I didn't know the guy he was with but I've heard a lot of good things about him. I don't know anyone else more deserving of life than that kid. He was nothing but nice to everyone around him. And he was funny as hell too. I remember like the first week of school this year we were cheating off each others English homework. I want to do something for him...I can't think of anything good enough or big enough to explain how much me and tons of other people are gonna miss him. Me and him weren't the closest of friends but that doesn't effect the way I feel right now. Anyone who reads this and knew Andrew;or Dan cuz he deserves the same, we need to get together and figure out something to do for him, a memorial is the simple answer and yes we need to make one for them but I would like to do something else in their memory...something huge that will make everyone remember them, even the people that didn't know them. I just want everyone to see how awesome these kids were to all of their friends. I know there is a lot of people out there right now thinking about them so lets get together and try and figure something for them. Get back to me about this post and go from there


RIP-Andrew Cao and Dan Mattlab



-adamo
